title: Michael O'Neill: NI manager tells fans to 'stay safe' amid coronavirus crisis
description: Northern Ireland boss Michael O'Neill calls on supporters to adhere to coronavirus guidelines on the scheduled day of the Euro 2020 play-off with Bosnia-Herzegovina.
content:
Michael O'Neill puts health first in his message to Northern Ireland fans
NI boss Michael O'Neill has called on fans to obey coronavirus guidelines on the scheduled day of the Euro 2020 play-off with Bosnia-Herzegovina.
The game has been pushed back to June… [+1756 chars]
